name: MX Motocross! Motorcycle Racing
description:
Motocross Racing with realistic control to face the challenges of unique bad uphill & downhill environments will test your motorbike driving skills, it can help you become a great bike racer
MX motocross Free racing game with realistic physics, fun, nice graphics, multiple scenes, select motorbike.
You can earn gold when pass level a map, motorbike fly in the air, motobike flipped, ... and use gold to buy your motobike.
Now let join the up hill moto racing, win and get more trophies !

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tilt Sensitivity : Keep balance by tilt your device.
- Buttons : Keep balance by press onscreen buttons.
- Using Brake to brake your motor.

Features:
- Simple and smooth control
- Numerous scenes with levels to reach in each
- Physics based racing game
- Feel good graphics

Starting the challenging motorcycle driving journey
